subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Linebacker Mathias Kiwanuka has a broken left leg and is out for the season, and the fleet of running backs is no longer deep as Brandon Jacobs has a sore left hamstring.
snippet: Linebacker Mathias Kiwanuka has a broken left leg and is out for the season, and the fleet of running backs is no longer deep as Brandon Jacobs has a sore left hamstring.
